name: ADVERSE_EVENT_REVIEW_INFO
description: The ADVERSE_EVENT_REVIEW_INFO table contains information about the reviews of the adverse events for a given study association.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the enrollment record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AE_REVIEW_HX_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of a historical review of the adverse events for a study association.

columns.name: AE_REVIEW_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of a reviewing user for a historical review of the adverse events for a study association.

columns.name: AE_REVIEW_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
